title: Sun and Moon, Ice and Snow
description: When a great white bear promises untold riches to her family, the Lass (as she's known) agrees to go away with him. But the bear is not what he seems, nor is his castle. To unravel the mystery, the Lass sets out on a windswept journey beyond the edge of the world. Based on the Nordic legend East of the Sun, West of the Moon , with romantic echoes of Beauty and the Beast , this re-imagined story will leave fans of fantasy and fairytale enchanted.
author: Jessica Day George
